subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After the Florida State Seminoles finished 7-6 last season — their worst record since 1981 — Coach Bobby Bowden reshaped his coaching staff with several high-profile hires.
snippet: After the Florida State Seminoles finished 7-6 last season — their worst record since 1981 — Coach Bobby Bowden reshaped his coaching staff with several high-profile hires.
